column1: Scene Text Detection with Supervised Pyramid Context Network

column2: Yuhang Zang@University of Electronic Science and Technology of China

column1: Scene text detection methods based on deep learning have achieved remarkable results over the past years. However
column2: due to the high diversity and complexity of natural scenes
column3: previous state-of-the-art text detection methods may still produce a considerable amount of false positives
column4: when applied to images captured in real-world environments. To tackle this issue
column6: we propose in this paper an effective model for scene text detection
column7: which is based on Feature Pyramid Network (FPN) and instance segmentation. We propose a supervised pyramid context network (SPCNET) to precisely locate text regions while suppressing false positives.
